name: tgc-project2-digital-library
description: - This project will be a cataloguing digital library web application of books and music. ###### Project Features:        - Admin: can add, delete, update, and has approves or denies suggestions made by users;        - Users: can browse through list of catalogue of preference and suggest books and music;        - Searching: **Books** {by author, by title, by year of publication}; **Music** {by Artist, by title, by genre};        - Optional Info: link to book/music website {store, stream}
